stateSpaceHanoi:
STATE:

STATE_ATTRIBUTES:
attr0 is set of number
attr1 is set of number
attr2 is set of number

STATE_START:
$0 = {1, 2, 3, inf}
$1 = {inf}
$2 = {inf}

STATE_GOAL:
$2 == {1, 2, 3, inf}

OPERATORS:

OPERATOR_DESCRIPTION:
cost 1
param i from 0 to 2 by 1
param j from 0 to 2 by 1

OPERATOR_PRECONDITION:
i!=j and
card($i) != 1 and
min($i)<min($j)

OPERATOR_EFFECT:
$j = add($j, min($i))
$i = remove($i, min($i))
stateSpaceKnight:
STATE:

STATE_ATTRIBUTES:
attr0 is matrix[5][5] of number
attr1 is matrix[1][1] of number
attr2 is matrix[1][1] of number

STATE_START:
$0[2][2] = 1
$1[0][0] = 2
$2[0][0] = 2

STATE_GOAL:
sum($0) == 25

OPERATORS:

OPERATOR_DESCRIPTION:
cost 1

OPERATOR_PRECONDITION:
var number x = $1[0][0] + 1
var number y = $2[0][0] - 2
x <= 4 and
y >= 0 and
$0[x][y] == 0

OPERATOR_EFFECT:
var number x = $1[0][0] + 1
var number y = $2[0][0] - 2
$0[x][y] = 1
$1[0][0] = $1[0][0] + 1
$2[0][0] = $2[0][0] - 2

OPERATOR_DESCRIPTION:
cost 1

OPERATOR_PRECONDITION:
var number x = $1[0][0] + 2
var number y = $2[0][0] - 1
x <= 4 and
y >= 0 and
$0[x][y] == 0

OPERATOR_EFFECT:
var number x = $1[0][0] + 2
var number y = $2[0][0] - 1
$0[x][y] = 1
$1[0][0] = $1[0][0] + 2
$2[0][0] = $2[0][0] - 1

OPERATOR_DESCRIPTION:
cost 1

OPERATOR_PRECONDITION:
var number x = $1[0][0] + 2
var number y = $2[0][0] + 1
x <= 4 and
y <= 4 and
$0[x][y] == 0

OPERATOR_EFFECT:
var number x = $1[0][0] + 2
var number y = $2[0][0] + 1
$0[x][y] = 1
$1[0][0] = $1[0][0] + 2
$2[0][0] = $2[0][0] + 1

OPERATOR_DESCRIPTION:
cost 1

OPERATOR_PRECONDITION:
var number x = $1[0][0] + 1
var number y = $2[0][0] + 2
x <= 4 and
y <= 4 and
$0[x][y] == 0

OPERATOR_EFFECT:
var number x = $1[0][0] + 1
var number y = $2[0][0] + 2
$0[x][y] = 1
$1[0][0] = $1[0][0] + 1
$2[0][0] = $2[0][0] + 2

OPERATOR_DESCRIPTION:
cost 1

OPERATOR_PRECONDITION:
var number x = $1[0][0] - 1
var number y = $2[0][0] + 2
x >= 0 and
y <= 4 and
$0[x][y] == 0

OPERATOR_EFFECT:
var number x = $1[0][0] - 1
var number y = $2[0][0] + 2
$0[x][y] = 1
$1[0][0] = $1[0][0] - 1
$2[0][0] = $2[0][0] + 2

OPERATOR_DESCRIPTION:
cost 1

OPERATOR_PRECONDITION:
var number x = $1[0][0] - 2
var number y = $2[0][0] + 1
x >= 0 and
y <= 4 and
$0[x][y] == 0

OPERATOR_EFFECT:
var number x = $1[0][0] - 2
var number y = $2[0][0] + 1
$0[x][y] = 1
$1[0][0] = $1[0][0] - 2
$2[0][0] = $2[0][0] + 1

OPERATOR_DESCRIPTION:
cost 1

OPERATOR_PRECONDITION:
var number x = $1[0][0] - 2
var number y = $2[0][0] - 1
x >= 0 and
y >= 0 and
$0[x][y] == 0

OPERATOR_EFFECT:
var number x = $1[0][0] - 2
var number y = $2[0][0] - 1
$0[x][y] = 1
$1[0][0] = $1[0][0] - 2
$2[0][0] = $2[0][0] - 1

OPERATOR_DESCRIPTION:
cost 1

OPERATOR_PRECONDITION:
var number x = $1[0][0] - 1
var number y = $2[0][0] - 2
x >= 0 and
y >= 0 and
$0[x][y] == 0

OPERATOR_EFFECT:
var number x = $1[0][0] - 1
var number y = $2[0][0] - 2
$0[x][y] = 1
$1[0][0] = $1[0][0] - 1
$2[0][0] = $2[0][0] - 2
stateSpaceQueens:
STATE:

STATE_ATTRIBUTES:
attr0 is matrix[8][8] of number

STATE_START:

STATE_GOAL:
sum($0) == 72

OPERATORS:

OPERATOR_DESCRIPTION:
cost 1
param i from 0 to 7 by 1
param j from 0 to 7 by 1

OPERATOR_PRECONDITION:
$0[i][j] == 0

OPERATOR_EFFECT:
for k from 0 to 7 by 1
{
    $0[k][j] = 1
    $0[i][k] = 1
}
for k from 1 to min(i, j) by 1
{
    $0[i-k][j-k] = 1
}
for k from 1 to 7 - max(i, j) by 1
{
    $0[i+k][j+k] = 1
}
$0[i][j] = 2
stateSpaceJugs:
STATE:

STATE_ATTRIBUTES:
attr0 is matrix[1][3] of number
attr1 is matrix[1][3] of number

STATE_START:
$0[0][0] = 5
$0[0][1] = 0
$0[0][2] = 0

$1[0][0] = 5
$1[0][1] = 3
$1[0][2] = 2

STATE_GOAL:
$0[0][0] == 4

OPERATORS:

OPERATOR_DESCRIPTION:
cost 1
param i from 0 to 2 by 1
param j from 0 to 2 by 1

OPERATOR_PRECONDITION:
i!=j and
$0[0][i]!=0 and
$0[0][j]!=$1[0][j]

OPERATOR_EFFECT:
var number beer =  min($0[0][i], $1[0][j] - $0[0][j])
$0[0][i] = $0[0][i] - beer
$0[0][j] = $0[0][j] + beer
